title: revoke access
extract: To revoke 3rd party app access to your Twitter account go to Apps tab of your account settings. Click the Revoke Access button next to the application. To revoke 3rd party app access to your Gmail data go to Google Account settings.
extract_html: To revoke 3rd party app access to your Twitter account go to Apps tab of your account settings. Click the Revoke Access button next to the application. To revoke 3rd party app access to your Gmail data go to Google Account settings.
